content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) connected to offshore pump via pipes (currently fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=5262) connecting to mining drills

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) - working, output to chest
  - (18.5, 70.5) - working, output to chest
  - (21.5, 70.5) - working, output to chest
  - (24.5, 70.5) - working, output to chest
  - (27.5, 70.5) - working, output to chest
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no fuel
- 5 Burner inserters between iron and steel furnaces
- 5 Wooden chests at output positions (15.5,72.5) to (27.5,72.5) containing iron ore
- Power poles connecting all mining drills to power network

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Placement Conflicts (continued)
- Repeated failures placing burner inserters at furnace positions (16.0,70.5)
- Verify space is available before placing inserters
- Remove existing entities blocking placement positions

### Power Pole Placement Issues (continued)
- Failed to place small electric poles at (17.0,68.5) and (16.0,69.5)
- Check for water or existing entities before placing poles
- Use underground power lines to cross water obstacles

### Output Blockage Issues (resolved)
- Mining drills now properly connected to chests
- Maintain this configuration and monitor for future blockages

### Furnace Input System (new)
- Multiple furnaces showing "no ingredients" status
- Verify inserter connections between chests and furnaces
- Ensure proper fuel supply to all furnaces

### Entity Placement Verification (continued)
- Always check position availability before placement attempts
- Use get_entities_at() to verify empty positions
- Implement proper error handling for placement failures

### Power Connection Verification (continued)
- Ensure all mining drills remain properly connected to power
- Monitor power network status regularly
- Add additional power poles if needed to maintain connections
